entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Webequie
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
